idea: Rubiz (Viaara Fintech Pvt Ltd.) is fintech startup focused on digitising the cooperative credit societies.  Rubiz- Digital Inclusion platform will enable credit societies, nidhi companies, chit funds, patsanstha, etc to digitally connect their customers. Rubiz is a multilingual SaaS platform, assisting cooperative credit entities in conducting their operations like loans, deposits, complaints, accounts management, payments, transfers, etc. Customers can use rubiz app to access their society account, and to transact, manage, pay, transfer funds, generate statements, etc. We intend to revolutionize how credit societies are seen and function with intelligent use of technology, agile application, and secure services.
name: Rubiz
